content:
path /v3/multitoken/transaction/chain/address/tokenaddress
operationid multitokengettransactionbyaddress
parameters
description blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required true
schema
type string
description account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required true
schema
type string
description address of the token smart contract
in path
name tokenaddress
required true
schema
type string
description max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pagesize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required true
description offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
description transactions from this block onwards will be included
in query
name from
schema
type number
minimum 0
description transactions up to this block will be included
in query
name to
schema
type number
minimum 0
summary get multi token transactions on a blockchain address
description 1 credit per api call
get incoming and outgoing multi token transactions on a blockchain address
this api is supported for the following blockchains

celo
ethereum
polygon
responses
200
schema
type array
oneof
multitx
type object
properties
blocknumber
type number
description block number
txid
type string
description transaction id
contractaddress
type string
description contract address
tokenid
type string
description id of the token
amount
type string
description amount of tokens transferred
from
type string
description sender
operator
type string
description operator
to
type string
description recipient
required
blocknumber
txid
contractaddress
tokenid
from
to
amount
operator
description ok
tag_summary:
a multi token combines characteristics of fungible and nonfungible tokens a single multi token smart contract allows you to mint fungible nonfungible and semifungible tokens and process different types of the tokens in a single transaction multi tokens are described by the erc1155 standard on the ethereum blockchain or by the equivalent standard on the other blockchains
multi tokens can be used for nearly any digital asset or good to ensure authenticity and scarcity for example

ingame assets multi tokens can be used to create unique collectibles in the form of characters weapons skins or other equipment players can resell or trade assets directly as they choose and their authenticity is easily verifiable
music and other digital media multi tokens can be used to create rare and unique collectible digital releases similarly multi tokens can be used to sell videos art or any other type of digital media collectors can own digital originals of their favorite songs movies and so on
digital sports merchandise trading cards memorabilia classic moments in sports history and oneofakind experiences can be sold as multi tokens

each multi tokenrelated api supports its own set of the blockchains the list of the supported blockchains is provided in the api description further in this section
title: 33_Multi Tokens (ERC-1155 or compatible)_MultiTokenGetTransactionByAddress_320.json
